inferCSN 0.1.0

inferCSN

Install

Using pak 

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("mengxu98/inferCSN")

Using git clone 

git clone https://github.com/mengxu98/inferCSN.git
cd inferCSN
sh scripts/requirements.sh
sudo R CMD INSTALL .
# Some packages may prompt not available, please install.
